django.contrib.gis.utils.ogrinfo
================================

.. py:module:: django.contrib.gis.utils.ogrinfo

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   This module includes some utility functions for inspecting the layout
   of a GDAL data source -- the functionality is analogous to the output
   produced by the `ogrinfo` utility.



Functions
---------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.contrib.gis.utils.ogrinfo.ogrinfo


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:function:: ogrinfo(data_source, num_features=10)

   Walk the available layers in the supplied `data_source`, displaying
   the fields for the first `num_features` features.
